verses.name: John 3:4
verses.text: Nicodemus saith unto him, How can a man be born when he is old? can he enter the second time into his mother’s womb, and be born?

verses.name: John 3:5
verses.text: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

verses.name: John 3:6
verses.text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.

verses.name: John 3:7
verses.text: Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born again.
